problem_statement: Update Utilization Efficiency at T>374C:\nPlaceholder value of 0.4 added in https://github.com/softwareengineerprogrammer/GEOPHIRES-X/commit/cb1adf81f6f67a42a24ee6de8b26927cbcef5721 - but we expect this value to be higher and should replace once we find an appropriate reference, per https://github.com/softwareengineerprogrammer/GEOPHIRES-X/pull/16#issuecomment-1977282436
patch:
["diff --git a/src/geophires_x_client/geophires_x_result.py b/src/geophires_x_client/geophires_x_result.py

                 'Average Cooling Production',
                 'Average Annual Geothermal Heat Production',
@@ -41,6 +42,7 @@ class GeophiresXResult:

                 'Geothermal gradient',
                 'Segment 1   Geothermal gradient',
                 'Segment 1   Thickness',

@@ -67,7 +64,17 @@ class OutputParameter(HasQuantity):
     # set to PreferredUnits by default assuming that the current units are the preferred units -
     # they will only change if the read function reads a different unit associated with a parameter
     CurrentUnits: Enum = PreferredUnits
-    UnitsMatch: bool = True # FIXME calculate from whether current & preferred match
+
+    @property
+    def UnitsMatch(self) -> str:
+        return self.CurrentUnits == self.PreferredUnits
+
+    def with_preferred_units(self) -> Any:  # Any is a proxy for Self
+        ret: OutputParameter = dataclasses.replace(self)
+        ret.value = ret.quantity().to(ret.PreferredUnits).magnitude
+        ret.CurrentUnits = ret.PreferredUnits
+        return ret
+
